main.name: Md Arif Hossain
main.description: I create software, design websites, code beautifully simple things, make ideas happen, and I love what I do.
main.bio: Hello! I'm Arif, a programmer with a good level of expertise in Front End Web Development. I'm currently studying at Southwest Forestry University pursuing a degree in Bachelor of Science under the Department of Computer Science and Technology. I love Programming and tech-related stuff. I like to write blogs about web-related things. I'm interested in MERN(Mongo, Express, React, NodeJS) Web Development. Now-a-days, I'm try to do something with Deno.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get help or anything else.

testimonials.text: Arif is a passionate JavaScript developer and has an excellent work ethic. Besides being an avid learner, he is also very hard working. He is also strict about his deadlines. I believe he will be an asset to any team.
Arif is a Passionate web developer. He is an expert in React Js, Javascript, Python & many frameworks. I was wondering about his skills. Highly recommended for Any Types of web development work.
